departure_date.description: The date and time of departure in UTC in RFC3339 format

port.description: The code of the port of departure. These are 5 letter codes prefixed with a 2 letter country code and a 3 letter port identifier. Example: NLURK, BEANR

anticipated_activity.description: The anticipated activity for the fishing trip. Please check the wiki for the meaning of these codes.

position.description: The location of the vessel at the time of departure
